events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on April 30th, requesting to start the claim process immediately.
Claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident based on the details mentioning car collision and damages.
An agent specializing in vehicle accident claims has been assigned to handle the customer's case promptly.
Acknowledgment sent to the customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and outlining next steps.
Requested the customer to provide photographs of the damaged vehicle, police report, and driver’s license copy.
Customer submitted all requested documents including detailed pictures of the car damage and an official police report.
Investigation team began assessing the severity of the vehicle damages and verifying the legitimacy of the accident report.
Investigation concluded confirming that the collision was the third party’s fault and all documentation is in order.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover vehicle repairs and rental car costs during the refurbishment period.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the settlement terms and appreciated the prompt responses from the claims team.
The claim approval was finalized enabling immediate processing of the agreed compensation for the vehicle damages.
Payment was disbursed to the customer’s account covering all repair expenses and additional rental car fees.
The claim case was officially closed after full settlement and payment confirmation with no further outstanding issues.
All claim documents and communications were archived in the system for record-keeping and future reference.
